title: Primitive feature mapping
description: An object mapping per-vertex feature IDs to a feature table.

featureTable.description: The ID of the feature table in the model's root `EXT_feature_metadata.featureTables` dictionary.

featureIds.description: An object describing per-vertex feature IDs to be used as indices to property arrays in the feature table. Feature IDs must be whole numbers in the range `[0, count - 1]` (inclusive), where `count` is the total number of elements in each property array.
